title: Module 6 Quiz: Your Future at Overdose

questions.question: What is the recommended focus during your first 30 days at Overdose?
questions.questionHtml: What is the recommended focus during your first 30 days at Overdose?

answers.text: Learning mode — absorb how things work, build relationships, ask questions
answers.textHtml: Learning mode — absorb how things work, build relationships, ask questions

answers.text: Immediately propose major changes to processes
answers.textHtml: Immediately propose major changes to processes

answers.text: Take on leadership responsibilities
answers.textHtml: Take on leadership responsibilities

answers.text: Work independently without asking questions
answers.textHtml: Work independently without asking questions

questions.feedback: Your first 30 days should focus on learning mode — understanding how things work, building relationships with your team, learning tools and processes, and asking lots of questions. Learning IS your contribution during this phase.
questions.feedbackHtml: Your first 30 days should focus on learning mode — understanding how things work, building relationships with your team, learning tools and processes, and asking lots of questions. Learning IS your contribution during this phase.

questions.question: Which of the following are ways to create impact at Overdose? (Select all that apply)
questions.questionHtml: Which of the following are ways to create impact at Overdose? (Select all that apply)

answers.text: Craft excellence — becoming known for exceptional quality in your domain
answers.textHtml: Craft excellence — becoming known for exceptional quality in your domain

answers.text: Taking credit for other people's work
answers.textHtml: Taking credit for other people's work

answers.text: Process improvement — identifying inefficiencies and fixing them
answers.textHtml: Process improvement — identifying inefficiencies and fixing them

answers.text: Mentorship — helping others grow
answers.textHtml: Mentorship — helping others grow

questions.feedback: Impact at Overdose comes through craft excellence, client impact, process improvement, culture contribution, innovation, and mentorship. Taking credit for others' work is explicitly NOT a path to impact — it damages trust and reputation.
questions.feedbackHtml: Impact at Overdose comes through craft excellence, client impact, process improvement, culture contribution, innovation, and mentorship. Taking credit for others' work is explicitly NOT a path to impact — it damages trust and reputation.

questions.question: What is Overdose's philosophy on career development?
questions.questionHtml: What is Overdose's philosophy on career development?

answers.text: You own your development, but the company provides support through managers, mentors, and opportunities
answers.textHtml: You own your development, but the company provides support through managers, mentors, and opportunities

answers.text: The company decides your career path for you
answers.textHtml: The company decides your career path for you

answers.text: Career development is entirely your own responsibility with no company support
answers.textHtml: Career development is entirely your own responsibility with no company support

answers.text: Only managers can develop professionally
answers.textHtml: Only managers can develop professionally

questions.feedback: Career development at Overdose is a partnership. You own your development (bringing curiosity and effort), while the company provides support through manager conversations, learning resources, mentorship, and growth opportunities.
questions.feedbackHtml: Career development at Overdose is a partnership. You own your development (bringing curiosity and effort), while the company provides support through manager conversations, learning resources, mentorship, and growth opportunities.

questions.question: Which industry trends are creating growth opportunities for Overdose?
questions.questionHtml: Which industry trends are creating growth opportunities for Overdose?

answers.text: Commerce becoming omnichannel, technology fragmenting, AI transforming marketing, and talent shortages
answers.textHtml: Commerce becoming omnichannel, technology fragmenting, AI transforming marketing, and talent shortages

answers.text: Ecommerce is declining in favor of physical retail
answers.textHtml: Ecommerce is declining in favor of physical retail

answers.text: Companies are building all capabilities in-house
answers.textHtml: Companies are building all capabilities in-house

answers.text: All commerce platforms are becoming identical
answers.textHtml: All commerce platforms are becoming identical

questions.feedback: Key trends creating opportunities include: commerce becoming omnichanne, technology fragmenting (best-of-breed approach), data privacy changes, AI transforming what's possible, and talent shortages making agency expertise more valuable.
questions.feedbackHtml: Key trends creating opportunities include: commerce becoming omnichannel, technology fragmenting (best-of-breed approach), data privacy changes, AI transforming what's possible, and talent shortages making agency expertise more valuable.

questions.question: What is the right approach to balancing individual ambition with team success?
questions.questionHtml: What is the right approach to balancing individual ambition with team success?

answers.text: Celebrate team wins genuinely, support colleagues, share knowledge freely, and seek wins that benefit both you and the team
answers.textHtml: Celebrate team wins genuinely, support colleagues, share knowledge freely, and seek wins that benefit both you and the team

answers.text: Always prioritize your personal visibility over team outcomes
answers.textHtml: Always prioritize your personal visibility over team outcomes

answers.text: Hoard knowledge to maintain personal advantage
answers.textHtml: Hoard knowledge to maintain personal advantage

answers.text: Take credit for team accomplishments as your own
answers.textHtml: Take credit for team accomplishments as your own

questions.feedback: The right approach is to celebrate team wins, support colleagues, share knowledge freely, and seek wins that benefit both you and the team. Sustainable career success comes from being genuinely valuable to teams and clients.
questions.feedbackHtml: The right approach is to celebrate team wins, support colleagues, share knowledge freely, and seek wins that benefit both you and the team. Sustainable career success comes from being genuinely valuable to teams and clients.

questions.question: What does Overdose expect from you as a new employee?
questions.questionHtml: What does Overdose expect from you as a new employee?

answers.text: Bring your best effort, stay curious, be kind, speak up, deliver results, and care
answers.textHtml: Bring your best effort, stay curious, be kind, speak up, deliver results, and care

answers.text: Work yourself into exhaustion to prove your worth
answers.textHtml: Work yourself into exhaustion to prove your worth

answers.text: Stay quiet and follow orders without questioning
answers.textHtml: Stay quiet and follow orders without questioning

answers.text: Treat work as your entire identity
answers.textHtml: Treat work as your entire identity

questions.feedback: Overdose expects you to bring your best (not perfection), stay curious, be kind, speak up when you have ideas or see problems, deliver on commitments, and care about your work, clients, colleagues, and the company.
questions.feedbackHtml: Overdose expects you to bring your best (not perfection), stay curious, be kind, speak up when you have ideas or see problems, deliver on commitments, and care about your work, clients, colleagues, and the company.

questions.question: What are the two main career tracks at Overdose?
questions.questionHtml: What are the two main career tracks at Overdose?

answers.text: Individual Contributor track (deep expertise) and Management track (leading people)
answers.textHtml: Individual Contributor track (deep expertise) and Management track (leading people)

answers.text: Technical track and Non-technical track
answers.textHtml: Technical track and Non-technical track

answers.text: Client-facing track and Internal track
answers.textHtml: Client-facing track and Internal track

answers.text: Junior track and Senior track
answers.textHtml: Junior track and Senior track

questions.feedback: The two main career tracks are Individual Contributor (going deep on craft, becoming a recognized expert without managing people) and Management (leading people, building teams, driving organizational outcomes). Neither is 'better' — what matters is finding the path that fits your strengths.
questions.feedbackHtml: The two main career tracks are Individual Contributor (going deep on craft, becoming a recognized expert without managing people) and Management (leading people, building teams, driving organizational outcomes). Neither is 'better' — what matters is finding the path that fits your strengths.

questions.question: How should you build visibility for your contributions without crossing into self-promotion?
questions.questionHtml: How should you build visibility for your contributions without crossing into self-promotion?

answers.text: Document your work, share wins and learnings in appropriate channels, contribute in meetings, and give credit to collaborators
answers.textHtml: Document your work, share wins and learnings in appropriate channels, contribute in meetings, and give credit to collaborators

answers.text: Constantly talk about your accomplishments in every meeting
answers.textHtml: Constantly talk about your accomplishments in every meeting

answers.text: Send emails to executives about every task you complete
answers.textHtml: Send emails to executives about every task you complete

answers.text: Never mention your work and hope others notice
answers.textHtml: Never mention your work and hope others notice

questions.feedback: Build visibility by documenting your work, sharing proactively in appropriate channels, contributing in meetings, helping others succeed, and accepting recognition gracefully while giving credit to collaborators. Focus on the work, not yourself.
questions.feedbackHtml: Build visibility by documenting your work, sharing proactively in appropriate channels, contributing in meetings, helping others succeed, and accepting recognition gracefully while giving credit to collaborators. Focus on the work, not yourself.
